Text.Value: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: SWD Construction anim on both character <SimonG>

Text.Value: What were you doing when you were killed?

EditorData.AnimationTags: SWD Construction anim on both character <SimonG>

Text.Value: Where do you keep your valuables?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: SWD Construction anim on both character <SimonG>

Synopsis: Kanon was manning the mechanism that opened the gate to the Druid Grove. He was trying to open the gate to let Aradin and the player through when he was killed by approaching goblins. Here, the player is using the Speak With Dead spell on his corpse. He is ashamed that he was not able to open the gate, and believes that he's killed Aradin and the rest because of that failure. That said, he still speaks like a corpse - serious, detached, a bit spooky.
